message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. This is a special offer considering its value to you is $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'd like to offer $105.  I know it's worth $100 to you, so this would still be a good deal for both of us.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to pay more. I am willing to accept $107 for the product, as it's still a good deal for me considering its value to you.
